## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setOrigin() method

Sets the X and Z coordinates of the wave origin if it is an omni-directional wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOrigin(waveIndex: number, x: number, z: number): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

index of the wave to set.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

x


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

z


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Z coordinate of the wave origin


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
